description: Object representing amounts that have been deducted for tax at source in the retrieved tax calculation.

bbsi.description: Amount of Bank and Building Society Interest (BBSI). This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

ukLandAndProperty.description: Amount of UK Land & Property. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

cis.description: Amount of Construction Industry Scheme. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

securities.description: Amount of securities. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

voidedIsa.description: Amount of voided Individual Savings Account (ISA). This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

payeEmployments.description: Amount of Pay As You Earn (PAYE) employments. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

occupationalPensions.description: Amount of occupational pensions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

stateBenefits.description: Amount of state benefits. This value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

specialWithholdingTaxOrUkTaxPaid.description: Amount of Special Withholding Tax or UK Tax Paid. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

inYearAdjustmentCodedInLaterTaxYear.description: Amount of in-year adjustment coded in later tax year. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxTakenOffTradingIncome.description: Other tax taken off trading income apart from CIS deductions. This value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.
